column1: [BE] Kanoo App - Kanoo Users Give QR For External Scanning
column37:
As a Kanoo consumer, I would like to pay by give my global SD QR code

*Case 1: I pay for an external beneficiary*

# I access my SD card details
# Click the icon to move to global QR ( reference UI)
# The Qr will be generated after 90s or I click back to internal SD
# After payment successfully, I receive push notification "You have made an external transfer on <date time>.” Ex: You have made an external transfer on Jan 13, 2021, 14:56.” if the process is successful
# I can view that notification in notifications list, I stay at the current screen when I click on that notification ( reference UI)
# Transactions will be saved with category named "External Payment" in Transaction History and Latest Transaction ( like the process “Scan to pay with external merchant”)
# The system will update my balance every 30 minutes or I can refresh the wallet screen. The new balance = the latest last balance - pay amount - fee ( if have)
# Save transaction on App, Visipay ( reserve account, transaction and SD card - like the process “Scan to pay with external merchant”)

*Case 2: I pay for an internal beneficiary* 

# I access my SD card details
# Click the icon to move to global QR ( reference UI)
# The Qr will be generated after 90s or I click back to internal SD
# I can view that notification in notifications list, I stay at the current screen when I click on that notification ( reference UI)
# Transactions will be saved in Transaction History and Latest Transaction ( like the process “Scan to pay with internal merchant”)
# The new balance = the latest last balance - pay amount - fee processing
# Save transaction on App, Visipay ( reserve account, transaction and SD card - like the process “Scan to pay with internal merchant”)

!image-20210226-080931.png|width=33.33333333333333%!

column1: Kanoo App - Transactions Reporting
[BE] - Kanoo App - P2P - Kanoo Users Receive Money From External User
column37:
As a Kanoo consumer, I would like to receive money from an external sender

# I click button “Receive Sand Dollar” in SD detail → move to screen named “Receive Sand Dollar”, I would see
## QR code
## Text “Show QR Code for Sender to send. You may also specify the amount to receive.”
## A text “Enter Payment Amount”, the default value is $0.00 → I can enter the amount → only accept positive number → the QR code will auto change based on the amount while I entering.
## March 10, 2021: -The button “Continue“ will be enabled if the amount is greater than 0.00-
## -Click the button → pop-up with message “Please confirm you would like to receive $<amount> from an external Sender.“ → click yes to verify then back to home screen or no to close the pop-up- 
# Apply KYC limitation
# *Mar 24, 2021*: I receive push notification "You have received an external transfer of B$<amount>-on <date time>-.” Ex: You have received an external transfer of B$1.12” if the process is successful
# I can view that notification in notifications list, I stay at that screen when I click on that notification ( reference UI)
# Transactions will be saved with category named "External Payment" in Transaction History and Latest Transaction ( reference UI)
# The system will update my balance every 30 minutes or I can refresh the wallet screen. The new balance = the latest last balance + received amount 
# Save transaction on App, Visipay ( reserve account, transaction and SD card)

column1: [BE] - Kanoo App - P2P - Kanoo Users Send Money With External User By Typing QR
column37:
As a Kanoo consumer, I would like to send money to consumers outside Kanoo by feature “Send” in card details.

*Case 1: Kanoo users send money to an external beneficiary by typing QR*

# I access SD card details -> select send money ( reference UI)
# I click “The Sand Dollar ID” -> move to a new screen named Send Money → select tab Type
# I type beneficiary QR
## If that QR is internal → move to Send Money screen ( like the current process)
## If that QR is external → move to Send Money screen ( like case scan QR which has blank value) → then enter amount and memo
# Click Continue -> move to Enter PIN
# KYC limit transaction will be applied -> reuse the current messages
# *Mar 15, 2021*: I have to pay the amount + P2P fee. The balance will use the latest internal SD balance to process
# I would see a successful screen ( reference UI) if process successful or message "Send money unsuccessfully. An error has occurred. Please try again or contact customer service." if process fail
# *Mar 18, 2021* -I receive push notification "You have made an external transfer on <date time>.” Ex: You have made an external transfer on Jan 13, 2021, 14:56.” if the process is successful-
# I can view that notification in notifications list, I stay at the current screen when I click on that notification ( reference UI)
# Transactions will be saved with category named "Transfer Money" in Transaction History and Latest Transaction ( reference UI)
# The system will update my balance every 30 minutes or I can refresh the wallet screen. The new balance = the latest last balance - send amount - fee
# Save transaction on App, Visipay ( reserve account, transaction and SD card)

*Case 2: Kanoo users send money to an internal beneficiary by typing QR*

# I access SD card details -> select send money ( reference UI)
# I click “The Sand Dollar ID” -> move to a new screen named Send Money → select tab Type
# I type beneficiary QR
# Next steps like the current process of Internal Transfer Money 
# UI: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/600d4925-a1d4-4af5-b14a-99de9fb2cae4-355e/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/600d4925-a1d4-4af5-b14a-99de9fb2cae4-355e/|smart-link]

Git: Kanoo GitHub\\Kanoo Mobile App\\02-Concept\\Sand Dollar Card.xd

## If that QR is external → move to External Payment screen ( like case scan QR which has blank value) → then enter amount and memo

column1: ARM - Merchant Admin - Group Details
column37:
# In each group, I can View detail ( reference UI) and delete. The list is sorted by created date time desc.
## I can edit Group name and description. Group name will be verified like creation process.
## I can add a new record in users list → click button “Add User”, a new row is added at the bottom of the page ( reference UI)
### *Feb 25, 2021:* Click icon add, the system will check
#### Required fields: First Name, Last Name, Phone or Email. Highlight the field and display text “This field is required.” when hovering the mouse to “*”.
#### Invalid format: 
##### Max length for fields First, Last and Phone is 20 characters, Email is 100. Highlight the field and display text “Max length is 20.” or “Max length is 100.” when hovering the mouse to “*”
##### Invalid email: Highlight the field and display text “Invalid email address format.” when hovering the mouse to “*”
##### Invalid phone ( missing “+” or contain other characters): Highlight the field and display text “Please enter a valid phone number.” when hovering the mouse to “*”
#### Duplicate record only for this table based on phone or email → pop-up “This user already exists. Please check again.”
#### Add successfully → the table will be sorted by added date-time desc.
### Click icon cancel to disappear that row.
# I receive pop-up with message “User Group is deleted successfully.” for success case or “User Group is deleted unsuccessfully. Please try again later.” for fail case
## After being deleted successfully → the group is disappear

column1: ARM - Create Gift Card - Redeem Option and Link Merchant
column37:
As a Merchant Admin, I would like to customize when creating Gift cards. 

# *Feb 17, 2021*: Redeem Option and Linked Merchant - required
## Redeem Option - required: 
### Value “My Business”: value default
### Value “All Merchant”: grey-out area Linked Merchant
### Value “Include Merchant“: enable area Linked Merchant. Consumers can redeem GC at these merchants.
### Value “Exclude Merchant“: enable area Linked Merchant. Consumers can redeem GC at all merchant except these merchants.
## Linked Merchants 
### Default is my business name and I cannot remove
### I can search for merchant name and select merchant from the suggesting list. I can not find the merchant if it has been selected
### After selecting, the merchant will be added in below area, I can remove each merchant. 
### If I select another “Redeem Option“ → all selected merchant of the previous option will be reset 
## Save setting: if the Redeem Option is not All Merchant but no selected merchant → the system will save with “My Business“

column1: [On-hold] - ARM - Merchant Admin - Send Gifted Cash Card To Selected Users
column37:
As a Merchant Admin, I would like to send gifted cash card to selected users

# I go to Campaign → tab Gift Card Maker → tab Send Gifts
## The table list all active Kanoo consumers, sorted by registered date
## I can filter and search to get the list which I need. After search or filter, dipslay “Total <number> records found.”
# I click “Send To All Selected”
## Default is disabled and only enabled if one user is checked
## Click select all → select all users not just the number of users I am seeing
## Pop-up appear ( reference UI)

*I send Cash Card*

# Promotion type: I select Cash Card
# I can see the Gifted Cash Card image ( reference UI)
# Cash Card Amount: default “Enter amount”. The range is 5.00 → 500.00. Only accept integer, one “.” and 2 decimals
# Linked merchant: user only use this gift at these merchants
## Default is “Select a merchant”
## I can enter to search → then select from the suggesting list → reuse search behavior on Visipay - Fee configuration 
## I can view list of merchants selected then click “x” to remove a merchant
## This list is appear in card details
# Click “Send” → users will receive push notification and gift through app → reuse the current behaviors from [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KANOO-2084|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KANOO-2084|smart-link] 
## If field amount is left blank → red text “This field is required.”
## If amount is not in range → red text “Invalid amount. The amount must be greater than or equal to 5.00 and less than or equal to 500.00.”
# Click “Send” → receive message “This process may take up to a few minutes. You can check its status on Activity.” or “An error has occurred. Please try again later.” for any fail case by system

UI: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/e2bb2f21-4682-4d91-a637-777e1465013f-b7e8/screen/c2558524-9775-4ddd-bebb-dfd570037a70/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/e2bb2f21-4682-4d91-a637-777e1465013f-b7e8/screen/c2558524-9775-4ddd-bebb-dfd570037a70/|smart-link]

column1: POS - Receive SD money From External Users
column37:
As a Kanoo Merchant, I would like to modify QR code and give it to external consumers then confirm the transactions.

# Add a new feature below feature Pay named “Receive Sand Dollar” 
# Click on the feature → move to a new screen named “Receive Sand Dollar” then below information;
## QR code
## Text “Show QR Code for Sender to send. You may also specify the amount to receive.”
## *Feb 17, 2021*: A text field -with title- “Enter Payment Amount”, the default value is -B$0- $0.00 → staff can enter the amount → only accept positive number → the QR code will auto change based on the amount while the staff enters. 
## *Feb 17, 2021:* The button “Confirm Payment“ will be enabled if the amount is greater than 0.00
# I click the button “Confirm Payment” →  move to a new screen named “Confirm Payment”. This screen shows all transaction from all terminals of the merchant whose received amount equals the entered amount and have not been confirmed. The list is sorted by date time desc.
# *Feb 5, 2021*: I can -click the icon- pull from the top of the screen -Refresh- to refresh this screen → icon loading appears until the list is updated. Each record on the list display. *Feb 17, 2021*: I would see a text at the top of the screen “Pull down to refresh.“
## <sender SD ID> amount B$<received amount>
## Date time, format “dd mon, yyyy, hh:mm”
## Button “Confirm -Payment-” is always enabled
# *Feb 17, 2021* Click the button: pop-up with message “Please confirm you would like to receive $<amount> from an external Sender.“ → click yes to verify or no to close the pop-up
## If the verification fail → message “Confirm payment unsuccessfully. Please try again.” → close the message to refresh the screen.
## If the payment has been confirmed at the time I click the button → message “This payment has been confirmed.” → close the message to refresh the screen.
## *Feb 19, 2021*: If the payment is confirmed successfully → message “Confirm payment successfully. Please check in Transactions List.” → close the message → move to successfull screen of function Pay ( below image) → close the screen → back to home screen  -the home page- -Transaction list-→ transaction will be recorded in Transaction list with category “External Payment”

column1: [KanooPOS][School Menu] Update Status for School menu
column37:
To consistent with the Pickup/Delivery order, I would like to enhance below items:
1. When the order is completed by clicking on the Complete button using two ways

* One-click on the COMPLETE button
 
!346E3AFB-8830-492C-92A7-C1B1005E947F.jpg|width=200,height=183!
* Click on the Complete button on each product
 
!346E3AFB-8830-492C-92A7-C1B1005E947sF.jpg|width=200,height=183!
 
*Expected:* The push notification should be shown: "Your Order #\[Order Number] at \[Business Name] has been completed."


2. The notification should be saved on Notification on the left menu of Kanoo app
 

!4071F701-EA05-458C-8B6A-9077147440B3.jpg|width=200,height=183!


3. The email should be sent to the consumer. The format should be the same as the current behavior

!image-2021-02-03-10-32-45-257.png|width=200,height=183!

 
4. When both staffs do the same to complete order, the message should be shown "This order has been processed by another staff."

5. The Pickup button on the consumer app should be removed because we do not need to Scan QR Code to complete the order as before. I am not sure this is correct behavior, please confirm this case

column1: ARM - Merchant Admin - Check Sending Status
column37:
As a Merchant Admin, after sending gifts, I would like to check its status on Activity tab

# I go to Campaign → Gift Card Maker → Activity
# I can filter by sent date. 
## Default values are the current date
## If From date > To date → red text “From Date must not be greater than To Date.”
# The list is sorted by sent date desc.
## Format for each column: reference UI 
## Status: Successfully/ Fail/ Sending
# On each record, I can view detail
## I can filter by status: Successful → Fail → Sending
## Columns list: reference UI
### Account Type: anonymous is for users not in Kanoo
### Action: button “Resend” for only fail cases → click to resend → the button is disabled → it is enabled if resend fail
### Get QR: only for successful cases → click to get QR information as .pdf file ( reference UI)

column1: ARM - Merchant Admin - Send Gift Card and Coupon To A User Group
column37:
As a Merchant Admin, I would like to send gift ( coupon, gift card) to a group user

# I go to Campaign → tab Gift Card Maker → tab Send Gifts
# I click “Send To A Group” → pop-up appears ( reference UI)

*I send Gift card or Coupon*

# Group: 
## The list show all current user groups → sorted by created date
## I can only select one
# Promotion type: I select Gift Card or Coupon
# Promotion Item: list all active and valid Gift Card or Coupon → reuse format from Promotion Offer
# I can see the item I selected 
# Linked merchant: user only use this gift at these merchants. Only appear if Promotion Type is Gift Card
## Shows linked merchants. Number of merchants > 2 rows → scroll to see more. If linked merchant is all merchants → only display a label “All Merchants” 
# Click “Send” → only users in the group will receive push notification and gift through app ( if they in Kanoo system) and through email ( if they not in Kanoo system) → reuse the current behaviors from Promotion Offer  
# Click “Send” 
## *Feb 26, 2021:* -If group is left blank → red text “This field is required.”- This button is disabled by default and only enabled when all info above is fulfilled.
## Receive message “This process may take up to a few minutes. You can check its status on Activity.”
## Receive message “An error has occurred. Please try again later.” for any fail case by system

column1: ARM - Kanoo Merchants Transfer Money To External Beneficiary
column37:
As a Merchant Admin, I would like to send money to external beneficiary. I would see a new tab named “Transfer External” next to tab “Transfer to consumer”

*Case 1: I receive money:* [https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KANOO-3149|https://kardsys.atlassian.net/browse/KANOO-3149|smart-link] 

*Case 2: I send money - Mar 16, 2021*

# Can send money to an external beneficiary by tab “Transfer to Merchant” or “Transfer to Consumer”
# I select “Send by the Sand Dollar Card”
# Add one more value “The Sand Dollar ID” at the top of the dropdown “To”
# All below fields are replaced with Recipient Address, Amount, PIN, Memo
# I have to enter some information  (reference UI)
## I have to enter SD ID in “Recipient Address” - required field. No limit length. It can be 12 characters or custom text. Ex: EEU9HR04XGXF or  [+kanoo+14049161234@sanddollar.bs+|mailto:kanoo+14049161234@sanddollar.bs]
## I have to enter the amount - required filed. -Field amount: only accept positive number and one ".", allow 2 decimals, default value is “Enter Amount”, the system auto fill ".00" if I enter integer. Maxlength is 10 character, I cannot type more. I can type memo -- use the current format and validation
## I enter SD PIN - required field
## I can type memo - optional. It will appear on successful screen
### Format: -free text. Limit 250 characters. I can type >250 charcaters → click button to process next steps → red text “The content has exceeded 250 characters.”- Use the current format
# I click the button Send → validate data → process next step like the current process
# KYC limit transaction will be applied -> reuse the current messages
# I have to pay the amount + B2P fee or B2B fee based on the current tab. The balance will use the latest *internal SD balance* to process
# I would see a successful message like the current process if sending successful or message “An error has occurred. Please try again or contact customer service.” if process fail
# *March 4, 2021:* If the beneficiary does not have SD card: -“The beneficiary does not exist. Please check the entered information then try again."- “The beneficiary doesn't have The Sand Dollar Card. Please check the entered information then try again.”
# Transactions will be saved with category named "Transfer Money" in Transaction 
## Beneficiary info: entered SD information
## Remitter: my info 
# The system will update my transactions every 30 seconds. The new balance = the latest last balance - send amount - fee
# Save transaction on Visipay ( reserve account, transaction and SD card)

*Note for merchant when change phone* → he will receive message “Your Sand Dollar QR code will be updated based on your new phone number. Please use the updated QR code to avoid broken transactions.”

column1: User Privacy Setting - Finding, Message, Connection and Receiving Money
column37:
As a Kanoo consumer, I would like to set up my privacy in the left menu → Profile → Privacy Settings

* Add new features at the bottom list of features Profile  
* These privacies only apply for only users with users, specific and related features 

*Case 1: I set privacy for Find business and people*

# Click on Privacy Settings, I would see a screen with the title “Privacy Settings”
# I see a list of features and click on “Who can find me?”
# I see 3 options and I can check only one
## Options list with order: Everyone, Friends, Only me
### If I turn ON “Everyone” means everyone can find me
### If I turn ON “Friends” means only people in my connections can find me
### If I turn ON “Only me” means no one can find me
## Default only “Everyone” is turned on. If I turn another option ON, the current option is turned Off and I receive the message “Updated successfully”

*Case 2: I set privacy for Message*

# Click on Privacy Settings, I would see a screen with the title “Privacy Settings”
# I see a list of features and click on “Who can text me?”
# I see 3 options and I can check only one
## Options list with order: Everyone, Friends, Only me
### If I turn ON “Everyone” 
#### Everyone can find me in Message ( create conversation or add member) and chat with me
#### Everyone can find me in Find Business and People and click to chat with me
### If I turn ON “Friends” 
#### Only people in my connections can find me in Message ( create conversation or add member) and chat with me
#### The other can find me in Find Business and People but not see option Message ( except people in my connections)
### If I turn ON “Only me” 
#### No one  can find me in Message ( create conversation or add member)
#### Everyone can find me in Find Business and People but not see the option Message 
## Default only “Everyone” is turned on → I turn another option ON → the current option is turned Off and I receive the message “Updated successfully”

*Case 3: I set privacy for Add Connection*

# Click on Privacy Settings, I would see a screen with the title “Privacy Settings”
# I see a list of features and click on “Who can set connection with me?”
# I see 3 options and I can check only one
## Options list with order: Everyone, Friends, Only me
### If I turn ON “Everyone” 
#### Everyone can find me in Find Business and People and click to set a connection with me
### If I turn ON “Friends” 
#### Only people in my connections and their friend can find me in Find Business and People and click to set a connection with me
#### The other can find me in Find Business and People but not see option Connect 
### If I turn ON “Only me” 
#### Everyone can find me in Find Business and People but not see the option Connect 
## Default only “Everyone” is turned on. If I turn another option ON, the current option is turned Off and I receive the message “Updated successfully”

*Case 4: I set privacy for Transfer money*

# Click on Privacy Settings, I would see a screen with the title “Privacy Settings”
# I see a list of features and click on “Who can send money to me?”
# I see 3 options and I can check only one
## Options list with order: Everyone, Friends, Only me
### If I turn ON “Everyone” 
#### Everyone can find me in Find Business and People and click to send to me
#### Everyone can find me in card details then send
### If I turn ON “Friends” 
#### Only people in my connections can find me in Find Business and People and click to send to me
#### Only people in my connections can find me in card details then send
#### The other can find me in Find Business and People but not see option Send
#### The other cannot find me in  card details then send
### If I turn ON “Only me” 
#### Everyone can find me in Find Business and People but not see option Send
#### No one cannot find me in  card details then send
## Default only “Everyone” is turned on. If I turn another option ON → the current option is turned Off and I receive the message “Updated successfully”

As a Merchant Admin, I would like to see my sending status for each beneficiary, the fail reasons and resend.

# I can filter by Sent Date ( reference UI)
## Default values are the current date. No limit the date range. If from date > to date → red text below “From Date must not be greater than To Date.”
## I can view the number of results 
# I can view the sending result table with columns:
## Sent Date: must-have. Format “mon dd, yyyy, hh:mm”. Ex “Jan 10, 2021, 14:58”
## Sent By: full name. must-have
## Total Paid Amount: must-have, the total amount the merchant paid for successful cases. Format “B$<amount>”, only allow 2 decimals
## Status: format “success/ fail/ processing”, must-have
## Action: button View detail
## Paging like the current process
# I can view details of a sending time by click “View details”
## I can filter status and view the number of results 
### Value list is All → Successfully → Sending → Failed
## Table column
### Email: must-have
### Phone: must-have. Format “+1242…”
### Amount: must-have. Format “B$<amount>”
### Memo: optional
### Reason: only display for fail cases
#### “The Sand Dollar KYC limitation” if the beneficiary SD’s balance + receive amount > hold limitation
#### “KYC limitation” if the beneficiary cash card’s balance + receive amount > hold limitation
#### “No Sand Dollar Card” if the beneficiary does not have SD card
#### “Inactive” if the beneficiary is deactivated at the time I send money
#### “Deleted” if the beneficiary is deleted at the time I send money
#### “Insufficient funds” if the merchant does not have enough money when sending for a specific user
### Action: button “Resend” only display for fail cases → click to open pop-up require PIN → send again.

column1: ARM - Merchant Admin - Sending money
column37:
As a Merchant Admin, I would like to import CSV file and send money to selected user. I will be charged B2P fee for each user

# Upload CSV file
## I can download the template: columns are Email, Phone ( format “+1242..”), Amount ( format allow 2 decimals), Memo ( only text)
## If I upload an unsupported file → receive pop-up “This file type is not supported. Please choose a different file.” → cancel the uploading
## Only upload one file, the next file will replace the first one
## If the system found 1 record whose wrong format → reject that file → pop-up with message “Some records are invalid format. Please check then try again.” → cancel the uploading
## If the system found duplicated records → reject that file → pop-up with message “Some records are duplicated. Please check then try again.” → cancel the uploading
## Emoji after uploading will be turned into characters.
## If the file > 8MB → pop-up with message “The uploaded file exceeds 8MB limit. Please choose a different file.”
## Uploading successfully, records are listed in a table → paging like the current format, the list is sorted by alphabet email
# I can search by email, phone
# Select card payment: default is Kanoo Cash Card. I can choose SD card
# Click button “Send To All Selected”
## Disable if I dont select any user
## Pop-up required PIN → reuse all message of the current process
## The system will sum all amount + all fee
### If sum all amount + all fee > my current selected card payment balance → pop-up with message “Your current balance is not enough for this process. Please fund more money to your card then try again.” → cancel the process
### For other fail reasons → pop-up with message “An error has occurred. Please try again or contact customer service.”
### Sending successfully → pop-up with message “This process may take up to a few minutes. You can check its status on Activity.”
# Balance will be updated
# Transactions
## Category: Transfer Money
## Beneficiary: name, card number, email, phone, memo will be filled
## If I send successfully for n user → I would see n transaction

column1: KZ site and School menu - Enter PIN to complete payment
column37:
# Click button “Process to checkout” → I would see a pop-up enter PIN If I select any card for payment
# Reuse all format and message from the current app for this pop-up
# Button for next step is disable if PIN is left blank or not filled fully

column1: ARM - Merchant Admin -  Update and validate permission
column37:
Permissions list is updated and validated for every action on feature “Payroll”

*A. Add new featured then update permissions list*

# I would see a new feature named “Payroll” at the bottom of the menu list
# Click the feature → 2 would see 2 tabs “Payroll Processing” and “Activity”
# The permissions list is added more 2 items: 
## Payroll - Payroll Processing
## Payroll - Activity

*B. Validation*

# Payroll - Payroll Processing
## Create, Update: allow to send money, access and view tab
## Delete: not affect, access and view tab
## Read: access and view tab
# Payroll - Activity
## Create, Update: allow to resend money, view tab and details
## Delete: not affect, view tab and details
## Read: access, view tab and details

column1: [iOS] - Kanoo App - Kanoo Users Scan External Merchant QR
column37:
As a Kanoo consumer, I would like to make a SD payment at any merchant that accept SD, include the ones are not in Kanoo system.I can process these features: Pay with card, Air Pay ( card details), Transfer money ( P2P)

Validation for fields:

* The system auto trim leading and trailing spaces before validating

 *Airpay in card details for a beneficiary not in Kanoo* 

# I access SD card details then select Scan to pay to scan beneficiary's QR ( beneficiary can be merchant or person)
## *Feb 19, 2021*: I will be moved to another screen named is External Payment (reference UI) → I see QR value first with text “Recipient Address” then
### If the scanned QR has an amount > 0
#### I don't have to enter the amount. The field is grey-out and button “Continue” is enabled. -Field amount: only accept positive numbers and one ".", allow 2 decimals, default value is “Enter Amount”, the system auto fill ".00" if I enter integers. Max length is 10 character, I cannot type more-
#### I can type memo, limit is 500 characters. Reuse all format and validation from “Refund in order details” 
### If he scanned QR has an amount <=0 or blank
#### I have to enter the amount. Field amount: only accept positive number and one ".", allow 2 decimals, default value is “Enter Amount”, the system auto fill ".00" if I enter integers. Max length is 10 characters, I cannot type more. Button Continue is enabled if the entered amount > 0
#### I can type memo, limit is 500 characters. Reuse all format and validation from “Refund in order details”
# Click Continue -> move to Enter PIN
# KYC limit transaction will be applied -> reuse the current messages
# I have to pay the amount + convenience fee named "Sand Dollar Card - Convenience Fee" ( configured on Visipay). The balance will use the latest internal SD balance to process
# I would see a successful screen ( reference UI) if payment successful or "An error has occurred. Please try again or contact customer service." if payment fail
## If invalid QR code → message “Invalid QR code.”
## If merchant does not have SD card: “The beneficiary does not exist. Please check the entered information then try again."
# *Feb 2, 2021*: -I receive push notification "You have made an external payment on <date time>.” Ex: You have made an external payment on Jan 13, 2021, 14:56.” if the payment is successful-
# *Feb 2, 2021:* -I can view that notification in notifications list, I stay at the current screen when I click on that notification ( reference UI)-
# Transactions will be saved with category named "External Payment" with fee in Transaction History and Latest Transaction ( reference UI)
# The system will update my balance every 30 minutes or I can refresh the wallet screen. The new balance = the latest last balance - paid amount - fee
# Save transaction on App, Visipay ( reserve account, transaction and SD card)



UI: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/600d4925-a1d4-4af5-b14a-99de9fb2cae4-355e/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/600d4925-a1d4-4af5-b14a-99de9fb2cae4-355e/|smart-link]

column221: 10/Mar/21 5:10 PM;5e8c33ed6c8ec30b8ac87a95;[~accountid:557058:4c602b42-35ce-411c-b900-8ebe293945b4] this ticket is not available.

column1: External Sand Dollar Card - Auto Sync Transaction
column37:
Whenever kanoo users or merchants transfer money with those who don't have Kanoo app, transactions must be recorded and sync automatically

*Case 1: Sync all sand dollar transactions transferred to kanoo user or merchant on ARM and Visipay*

* External payment transaction are created, confirm on Visipay admin and ARM transaction make sure:
** External amount and balance are correct.
** Name category: External Payment
** Correct beneficiary and remitter
** Transactions are sorted descending by transaction time
* Balance report is update correctly.

*Case 2: Sync all sand dollar transactions transferred to kanoo user*

* External payment transaction are created, confirm Kanoo app make sure:
** External amount is correct.
** Name category: External Payment
** Correct remitter
** Transactions are sorted descending by transaction time
* Balance is update correctly.
* Receive notification.
* KYC is not applied

*Case 3: Receive Money in POS - Merchant transaction is synced by background job and POS pulls sand dollar transactions to confirm transaction after.*

# Transaction is synced to Kanoo system.
## External payment transaction is created and display transaction on Visipay admin and ARM without staff and terminal info.
# POS pull sand dollar transactions to confirm transaction
## Sand dollar transaction is displayed on POS screen.
## Staff confirm transaction successfully.
## Transaction is displayed on Transactions menu on POS.
## Make sure 1 external payment transaction is created.
## Exernal payment transaction is updated and display transaction on Visipay admin and ARM with staff and terminal info.

*Case 4: Receive Money in POS - POS pull sand dollar transactions to confirm transaction before merchant transaction is synced by background job.*

# POS pull sand dollar transactions to confirm transaction
## Sand dollar transaction is displayed on POS screen.
## Staff confirm transaction successfully.
## Transaction is displayed on Transactions menu on POS.
## Exernal payment transaction is created and display transaction on Visipay admin and ARM with staff and terminal info.
# Waiting for background job sync sand dollar transaction run completely.
## Make sure 1 external payment transaction is created.
## Staff and terminal info is kept on external transaction.
## 

*Case 5: Kanoo users and merchants continuously receive money from external*

* Receive transactions based on sending times.

+ 45s on production

06/Apr/21 3:51 PM;5f6073adbdb0780070018370;Update A/C for this ticket:

# {color:#ff991f}Sync all sand dollar transactions transferred to kanoo user or merchant{color}
*A/C:*

* External payment transaction are created, confirm on Visipay admin and ARM transaction make sure:
** External amount and balance are correct.
** Name category: External Payment
** Correct beneficiary and remitter
** Transactions are sorted descending by transaction time
* Balance report is update correctly.

{color:#ff991f}2. Sync user transactions{color}
*A/C:*

* External payment transaction are created, confirm Kanoo app make sure:
** External amount is correct.
** Name category: External Payment
** Correct remitter
** Transactions are sorted descending by transaction time
* Balance is update correctly.
* Receive notification.
* KYC is not applied

{color:#ff991f}3. Merchant transaction is synced by background job and POS pull sand dollar transactions to confirm transaction after.{color}
*A/C:*
Step 1: Transaction is synced to Kanoo system.

* External payment transaction is created and display transaction on Visipay admin and ARM without staff and terminal info.

Step 2: POS pull sand dollar transactions to confirm transaction

* Sand dollar transaction is displayed on POS screen.
* Staff confirm transaction successfully.
* Transaction is displayed on Transactions menu on POS.
* Make sure 1 external payment transaction is created.
* Exernal payment transaction is updated and display transaction on Visipay admin and ARM with staff and terminal info.

{color:#ff991f}4. POS pull sand dollar transactions to confirm transaction before merchant transaction is synced by background job.{color}
*A/C*:
Step 1: POS pull sand dollar transactions to confirm transaction

* Sand dollar transaction is displayed on POS screen.
* Staff confirm transaction successfully.
* Transaction is displayed on Transactions menu on POS.
* Exernal payment transaction is created and display transaction on Visipay admin and ARM with staff and terminal info.

Step 2: Wating for background job sync sand dollar transaction run completely.

* Make sure 1 external payment transaction is created.
* Staff and terminal info is keep on external transaction.

{color:#ff991f}5. Send continuously sand dollar money to user or merchant.{color}
*A/C:*

* 1 external payment transaction is created with 1 sand dollar transaction.

{color:#ff991f}6. External payment transaction is not synced when payment is created by kanoo user, mechant, POS.{color}
*A/C:*

* External payment transaction is not created after background job sync sand dollar transaction run completely.

column1: [BE] - Kanoo App - P2P - Kanoo Users Send Money With External User By Scanning  QR
column37:
As a Kanoo consumer, I would like to send money to consumers outside Kanoo by feature “Send” in card details.

*Case 1: Kanoo users send money to an external beneficiary by scanning QR*

# I access SD card details -> select send money ( reference UI)
# I click “The Sand Dollar ID” -> move to a new screen named Send Money
# I scan beneficiary QR
## *Mar 17, 2021* If the QR is not SD QR → I get message -“The beneficiary does not exist. Please check the QR code then try again."-“Invalid QR code.”
## If SD card is not exist → I get message “An error has occurred. Please try again or contact customer service.”
## If the scanned QR has an amount > 0
### I don't have to enter the amount. The field is grey-out and button “Continue” is enabled. 
### *Mar 17, 2021* I can type memo - optional field, limit is -500- 200 characters. Reuse all format and validation from “Refund in order details” 
## If he scanned QR has an amount <=0 or blank
### I have to enter the amount. Field amount: only accept positive number and one ".", allow 2 decimals, default value is “Enter Amount”, the system auto fill ".00" if I enter integers. *Mar 17, 2021* -Max length is 10 characters, I cannot type more-. Button Continue is enabled if the entered amount > 0
### *Mar 17, 2021* I can type memo - optional field, limit is -500- 200 characters. Reuse all format and validation from “Refund in order details” 
# Click Continue -> move to Enter PIN
# KYC limit transaction will be applied -> reuse the current messages
# *Mar 15, 2021*: I have to pay the amount + P2P fee. The balance will use the latest internal SD balance to process
# I would see a successful screen ( reference UI) if process successful or message "Send money unsuccessfully. An error has occurred. Please try again or contact customer service." if process fail
# *Mar 18, 2021* -I receive push notification "You have made an external transfer on <date time>.” Ex: You have made an external transfer on Jan 13, 2021, 14:56.” if the process is successful-
# I can view that notification in notifications list, I stay at the current screen when I click on that notification ( reference UI)
# Transactions will be saved with category named "Transfer Money" in Transaction History and Latest Transaction ( reference UI)
# The system will update my balance every 30 minutes or I can refresh the wallet screen. The new balance = the latest last balance - send amount - fee
# Save transaction on App, Visipay ( reserve account, transaction and SD card)

*Case 2: Kanoo users send money to an internal beneficiary by scanning QR*

# I access SD card details -> select send money ( reference UI)
# I click “The Sand Dollar ID” -> move to a new screen named Transfer Money
# I scan beneficiary QR
## *Mar 17, 2021* If the QR is not SD QR → I get message -“The beneficiary does not exist. Please check the QR code then try again."-“Invalid QR code.”
## If SD card is not exist → I get message “An error has occurred. Please try again or contact customer service.”
## If the scanned QR has an amount > 0
### I don't have to enter the amount. The field is grey-out and button “Continue” is enabled. 
### *Mar 17, 2021* I can type memo - optional field, limit is -500- 200 characters. Reuse all format and validation from “Refund in order details” 
## If he scanned QR has an amount <=0 or blank
### I have to enter the amount. Field amount: only accept positive number and one ".", allow 2 decimals, default value is “Enter Amount”, the system auto fill ".00" if I enter integers. Max length is 10 characters, I cannot type more. Button Continue is enabled if the entered amount > 0
### *Mar 17, 2021* I can type memo - optional field, limit is -500- 200 characters. Reuse all format and validation from “Refund in order details” 
# Click Continue -> move to Enter PIN
# KYC limit transaction will be applied -> reuse the current messages
# I have to pay the amount + P2P fee. The balance will use the latest internal SD balance to process
# Next steps like the current process of Internal Transfer Money 
# UI: [https://xd.adobe.com/view/600d4925-a1d4-4af5-b14a-99de9fb2cae4-355e/|https://xd.adobe.com/view/600d4925-a1d4-4af5-b14a-99de9fb2cae4-355e/|smart-link]

column1: [Android] - Kanoo App - Kanoo Users Scan External Merchant QR
column37:
As a Kanoo consumer, I would like to make a SD payment at any merchant that accept SD, include the ones are not in Kanoo system.I can process these features: Pay with card, Air Pay ( card details), Transfer money ( P2P)

Validation for fields:

* The system auto trim leading and trailing spaces before validating

 *Airpay in card details for a beneficiary not in Kanoo* 

# I access SD card details then select Scan to pay to scan beneficiary's QR ( beneficiary can be merchant or person)
I will be moved to another screen named is External Payment (reference UI) → I see QR value first then
a. I have to enter the amount. Field amount: only accept positive number and one ".", allow 2 decimals, default value is “Enter Amount”, the system auto fill ".00" if I enter integer. Maxlength is 10 character, I cannot type more
b. I can type memo, limit is 100 characters. Reuse all format and validation from “Refund in order details”
c. Button Continue is disable by default and the amount field is left blank
# Click Continue -> move to Enter PIN
# KYC limit transaction will be applied -> reuse the current messages
# I have to pay the amount + convenience fee named "Sand Dollar Card - Convenience Fee" ( configured on Visipay). The balance will use the latest internal SD balance to process
# I would see a successful screen ( reference UI) if payment successful or "An error has occurred. Please try again or contact customer service." if payment fail
## If invalid QR code → message “Invalid QR code.”
## If merchant does not have SD card: “The beneficiary does not exist. Please check the entered information then try again."
# *Feb 2, 2021*: -I receive push notification "You have made an external payment on <date time>.” Ex: You have made an external payment on Jan 13, 2021, 14:56.” if the payment is successful-
# *Feb 2, 2021:* -I can view that notification in notifications list, I stay at the current screen when I click on that notification ( reference UI)-
# Transactions will be saved with category named "External Payment" with fee in Transaction History and Latest Transaction ( reference UI)
# The system will update my balance every 30 minutes or I can refresh the wallet screen. The new balance = the latest last balance - paid amount - fee
# Save transaction on App, Visipay ( reserve account, transaction and SD card)

column37:
When paying by credit card, there are some enhancement message in validation. Applying for KZ, School menu, Web app and Kanoo app ( only for add a credit card)



* Current message for payment fail “We could not verify your payment details, try a different card or contact customer service.“
* Enhancement messages for specific cases: *Jan 25, 2021*
** Fraud
*** AVS failed -> -“Your billing address could not be verified, contact your bank.”- “Your billing address could not be verified. Please contact your bank.”
*** Invalid Credit Card Number → “ The card number entered is invalid.””
** Bad card
*** CVV incorrect - “The card authentication data is incorrect.“
**** SERV NOT ALLOWED → -“This card is not supported, contact your bank.”- “This card is not supported. Please contact your bank.”
**** Decline →  -“Your transaction has been declined, please contact your bank.”- “Your transaction has been declined. Please contact your bank.”
**** Insufficient Funds →  -“Your transaction has been declined because of insufficient funds, please contact your bank.”- “Your transaction has been declined because of insufficient funds. Please contact your bank.”
**** EXPIRED 54 →  “The card authentication data is incorrect.”
** Other →  -“We could not verify your payment details, try a different card or contact your bank.”- “We could not verify your payment details. Please try a different card or contact your bank.”

column1: Web App - Internal SD Payment
column37:
As a Kanoo consumer, I would like to use my SD card for payment on web as using app. The balance must be updated when I login between 2 environments

*A/ KYC will be applied to consumers:*

* Hold limitation: all cash goes to my SD card ( not include fee) - Over my SD card limitation 
** Pop-up show message on app “You cannot hold more than $<hold limitation based on my SD card’s level>.“ at the final step of the process → cancel the process
** Pop-up show message on POS “Your customer cannot hold more than $<hold limitation based on consumer SD card’s level>.“ at the final step of the process → cancel the process
* Transaction limitation: all cash out of my SD card ( not include fee) - Over my SD card limitation 
** Pop-up show message on app “You cannot transact more than $<number> a month.” or “You cannot transact more than $<number> a year.” at the final step of the process → cancel the process
** Pop-up show message on POS “Your customer cannot transact more than $<number> a month.” or “Your customer cannot transact more than $<number> a year.” at the final step of the process → cancel the process

*B/ KYC will be applied to merchant - hold limitation:*

* Over hold limitation after scanning ( the merchant receive the amount after being applied fees) → staff will get a message
** ”Cannot process the transaction. Merchant has reached the maximum holdings. Please contact the Merchant administrator for support.” → cancel the process
* If the merchant doesn't have an SD card, a pop-up appears with content “Sand Dollar card is not supported for now. Please try with another card.”.

*C/ Save transactions:*

* ARM, Visipay: reuse all format of the current SD payment on app.
* Web: use the current way of web and reference from app

*D/ Add SD card into list card for payment → below is the list of features* 

{color:#ff5630}1/ Load ( cash in-store, from credit card, from Kanoo cash card){color}

* When my SD is loaded, the system will check KYC hold limitation:
** If my current balance +funded amount > hold limitation → my card cannot be funded
** If my current balance < hold limitation → my card can be funded an amount = hold limitation - current balance

{color:#ff5630}2/ Withdraw ( cash in-store){color}

* When I withdraw, the system will check KYC transaction limitation based on my SD’s card level:
** I cannot withdraw if my current total transaction amount + withdraw amount > transaction limitation

{color:#ff5630}3/ Transfer money{color} ( Load to Kanoo Cash Card by SD card)

* When I transfer, the system will check KYC transaction limitation based on my SD’s card level:
** I cannot transfer if my current total transaction amount + transfer amount > transaction limitation

{color:#ff5630}4/ Send to friend{color}

* When I send, the system will check KYC transaction limitation based on my SD’s card level:
** I cannot send if my current total transaction amount + send amount > transaction limitation
* When I send, the system will check the beneficiary’s KYC hold limitation based on his SD’s card level:
** I cannot send if the beneficiary’s current balance + received amount > hold limitation. I will receive a message “Your friend cannot hold more than $<hold limitation based on beneficiary’s SD card’s level.>” → cancel the process

{color:#ff5630}5/ Pay with card{color}

* I can use my SD’s QR code for payment. This QR code is expired after 90s and only used for internal.
* If my current balance is not enough for payment, I can use many Gift cards
* Apply KYC transaction limit based on my SD’s card level

{color:#ff5630}6/ Refund ( in Card details){color}

* I choose the function Refund → give QR code for the staff. The code is expired after 90s
* Apply KYC hold limit based on my SD’s card level

{color:#ff5630}7/ TopUp{color}

Case 1: Top-up minute by card: apply KYC hold limit based on my SD’s card level and merchant If my current balance + pay amount > limitation

Case 2: Buy phone plan by card: apply KYC hold limit based on my SD’s card level and merchant If my current balance + pay amount > limitation

{color:#ff5630}8/ Bill Pay{color}

* At the final step → the system will apply KYC hold limit based on my SD’s card level and merchant If my current balance + pay amount > limitation ( for both cases: pay for a general merchant and Courtpay)


{color:#ff5630}9/ Pay in store details{color}

* At the final step → the system will apply KYC hold limit based on my SD’s card level and merchant If my current balance + pay amount > limitation

{color:#ff5630}10/ Buy GC in marketplace and in store ( with money) & Give GC{color}

* At the final step → the system will apply KYC hold limit based on my SD’s card level and merchant If my current balance + pay amount > limitation

column1: Enhance the schedule job to run on Load Balancer environment.

{code:sql}CREATE TABLE shedlock(name VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, lock_until TIMESTAMP(3) NOT NULL,

column37:

# I go to Campaign → tab Gift Card Maker → tab Send Gifts
## The table list all active Kanoo consumers, sorted by registered date
## I can filter and search to get the list which I need. After search or filter, dipslay “Total <number> records found.”

## Click select all → select all users I am seeing
## Pop-up appear ( reference UI)

*I send Gift card or Coupon*

# Promotion type: I select Gift Card or Coupon
# Promotion Item: list all active and valid Gift Card or Coupon → reuse format from Promotion Offer
# I can see the item I selected 
# *Feb 23, 2021:* Linked merchant: user only use this gift at these merchants. Only appear if Promotion Type is Gift Card
## Shows linked merchants. Number of merchants > 2 rows → scroll to see more. If linked merchant is all merchants → only display a label “All Merchants” 

   5. Click “Send” →users will receive push notification and gift through app → reuse the current behaviors from Promotion Offer  

   6. Click “Send” → receive message “This process may take up to a few minutes. You can check its status on Activity.” or “An error has occurred. Please try again later.”  fail cafor anyse by system

column1: ARM - Merchant Admin - Create User Group
column37:
As a Merchant Admin, I would like to create user groups by uploading CSV file. 

# I go to Campaign → tab Create User Group
# If there is no data → I would see only 2 buttons. Otherwise, I would see 2 buttons and table, use the current paging from “Promotion offer” ( reference UI)
# I click button “Download Template” to dowload template. It contains columns: First Name, Last Name, Email, Phone ( format “+1242…”).
# Click “Add New Group” → pop-up appear ( referrence UI)
## Default display search area and button “Upload CSV File”
## *Feb 26, 2021*: When uploading, the system will check then show the error message in red and the first error record:
### Required field: “Required fields are left blank. Please check again.”
### If I upload an unsupported file → “This file type is not supported. Please choose a different file.” and no record
### If the system found 1 record whose wrong format → “Some records are invalid format. Please check then try again.” and I can see icon “\!” at the header 
### If the system found duplicated records ( email or phone)->  “Some records are duplicated. Please check then try again.” 
### If the file > 8MB →  “The uploaded file exceeds 8MB limit. Please choose a different file.” and show no record 
### If the system found a record is over limitation → “Some records are over limitations. Max length of First Name, Last Name, Phone is 20 characters. Max length of Email is 100 characters.” and I can see icon “\!” at the header 
## Uploading successfully, display data on the table → the list is sorted by Created Date
### Description - oprional: only accept 100 characters \[a-z], \[A-Z], \[0-9] → red text below the field “The content has exceeded 100 characters.” if over limitation or “The content format is \[a-z], \[A-Z], \[0-9].” if invalid format. Apply this rule if I paste content
### If group name is left blank → click “Add New Group” → red text below the field “This field is required.”
### If group name is over limitation → click “Add New Group” → red text below the field “Max length is 50 characters.”
### If group name is exist → click “Add New Group” → red text below the field “This group name already exists. Please enter another one.”
### If add group name unsuccessfully → pop-up with message “User Group is added unsuccessfully. Please try again later.” → close the pop-up and cancel the process
### If add group name successfully → pop-up with message “User Group is added successfully.” → I would see group data on the table after closing the pop-up

{code:sql}CREATE TABLE `campaign_user_group` (
  `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `created_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL,
  `description` text,
  `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  `total_user` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `visikard_user_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=16 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4

CREATE TABLE `campaign_user_info` (
  `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `email` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  `first_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  `last_name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  `phone_number` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  `campaign_user_group_fk` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `FK73a36xsebhgpwhu3p4ffk9liu` (`campaign_user_group_fk`),
  CONSTRAINT `FK73a36xsebhgpwhu3p4ffk9liu` FOREIGN KEY (`campaign_user_group_fk`) REFERENCES `campaign_user_group` (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=131 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4{code}

column1: ARM - Merchant Admin - Gift card maker
column37:
As a Merchant Admin, I would like to customize when creating Gift cards. 

# Image of the GC - required field
## I can see a text “Search for an image and double-click to select or “Import Own Image”
## I enter keyword then click “Search”to search for an image
### The system will show images from google which < 8MB, I can click to slide images, double click on an image to select. I will receive pop-up “This image exceeds the allowable limitation ( 8MB).” if it over limitation
### Display “No images found.” if the system cannot find any images
## I click “Import Own Image” to upload from local storage
### The searched images are still there
### After import successfully → uploaded image replaces the current one → use the current cropping and scaling from KZ - upload category image
### I will receive pop-up 
#### “This image exceeds the allowable limitation ( 8MB).” if it over limitation
#### “This file type is not supported. Please choose a different file.” if it not type PNG, JPG, JPEG.
# Image title - required field
## I can type only text, it will appear on the bottom left on the GC → click outside to review
## Limit 10 characters, I can type more. When saving, I will be navigated to see red text below the field “The content has exceeded 10 characters.”
# Sticker - optional
## I can see a text “Search for a sticker and double-click to select or “Import Own Sticker”
## I enter keyword then click “Search” to search for a sticker
### The system will show stickers from google which < 8MB, I can click to slide, double click on a sticker to select. I will receive pop-up “This image exceeds the allowable limitation ( 8MB).” if it over limitation
### Display “No stickers found.” if the system cannot find any stickers
## I click “Import Own Sticker” to upload from local storage
### The searched stickers are still there
### After import successfully 
#### Uploaded sticker replaces the current one 
#### It will appear on the top left corner of the image → I can manually resize and drag it to every position on the image 
### I will receive pop-up 
#### “This image exceeds the allowable limitation ( 8MB).” if it over limitation
#### “This file type is not supported. Please choose a different file.” if it not type PNG, JPG, JPEG.
# *Feb 17, 2021*: Redeem Option and Linked Merchant - required
## Redeem Option - required:
### Value “My Business”: value default
### Value “All Merchant”: grey-out area Linked Merchant
### Value “Include Merchant“: enable area Linked Merchant. Consumers can redeem GC at these merchants.
### Value “Exclude Merchant“: enable area Linked Merchant. Consumers can redeem GC at all merchant except these merchants.
## Linked Merchants 
### Default is my business name and I cannot remove
### I can search for merchant name and select merchant from the suggesting list. I can not find the merchant if it has been selected
### After selecting, the merchant will be added in below area, I can remove each merchant.
### If I select another “Redeem Option“ → all selected merchant of the previous option will be reset
## Save setting: if the Redeem Option is not All Merchant but no selected merchant → the system will save with “My Business“
